message:
SYSTEM: TalkOEG_Oct2012_MultilingualWoD.pdf: Página 5
The Semantic Web is multilingual
The Semantic Web… 
• is highly multilingual 
495 different language tags in LOD (1) 
• although language tags are underused
• although language tags are underused
Semantic sources using language tags: 3% - 7%
(3)(2)
• Decreasing proportion of English labels
80% in 2007 (2) →  45% in 2011 (3)
5
(1) Source: LODStats  http://aksw.org/projects/LODStats (June 2012)
(2) Source: Watson  http://watson.kmi.open.ac.uk/blog/2007/11/20/1195580640000.html (Nov 2007)
(3) Source:  B. Ell et al., "Labels in the web of data," in Proc. of ISWC'11, pp. 162-176.
speaker: SYSTEM
